person.persName: Samuel O. Berry (Kentucky soldier (C.S.A.), guerrilla captain)

body.p: Kentucky Confederate soldier. Woodford County, Kentucky, native. Son of Samuel Oscar Berry and Elizabeth McGraw. Graduated from State normal school in Lexington, Kentucky. Teacher in Mercer County, Kentucky, in 1858. First Sergeant in the 6th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) from November 1, 1862, to February 28, 1863.
